mapper.insert: INSERT INTO live_chat_gid_uid_1_1 ( gid, uid, create_table_time, modify_table_time, state_table )VALUES( #{gid}, #{uid}, #{createTableTime}, #{modifyTableTime}, #{stateTable} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from live_chat_gid_uid_1_1 where gid = #{gid} and uid = #{uid} and state_table = 1

SELECT gid AS gid, uid AS uid, g_name AS gname, avatar AS avatar, announcement AS announcement, longitude AS longitude, latitude AS latitude FROM dada_group_1_1 WHERE invite_code = #{inviteCode} AND data_state = 1

SELECT lcm.msg_id AS msg_id, lcm.uid AS uid, lcm.type AS type, lcmi.info AS info, lcm.send_time AS time, g.avatar AS avatar FROM (live_chat_message_1_2 lcm, live_chat_message_info_1_1 lcmi) INNER JOIN dada_group_1_1 g ON g.gid = lcm.gid WHERE lcm.gid = #{gid} AND lcm.info = lcmi.info_id AND lcm.state_table = 1 ORDER BY lcm.msg_id DESC LIMIT #{count}

SELECT lcm.msg_id AS msg_id, lcm.uid AS uid, lcm.type AS type, lcmi.info AS info, lcm.send_time AS time, g.avatar AS avatar FROM (live_chat_message_1_2 lcm, live_chat_message_info_1_1 lcmi) INNER JOIN dada_group_1_1 g ON g.gid = lcm.gid WHERE lcm.gid = #{gid} AND lcm.info = lcmi.info_id AND lcm.state_table = 1 AND lcm.msg_id < #{endid} ORDER BY lcm.msg_id DESC LIMIT #{count}

SELECT lcm.msg_id AS msg_id, lcm.uid AS uid, lcm.type AS type, lcmi.info AS info, lcm.send_time AS time, g.avatar AS avatar FROM (live_chat_message_1_2 lcm, live_chat_message_info_1_1 lcmi) INNER JOIN dada_group_1_1 g ON g.gid = lcm.gid WHERE lcm.gid = #{gid} AND lcm.info = lcmi.info_id AND lcm.state_table = 1 AND lcm.msg_id > #{startid} LIMIT #{count}
